mapper.sql: id, user_id, bank_name, subject_id, uploader_id, collected_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam_bank_collection (user_id, bank_name, subject_id, uploader_id, collected_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{bankName}, #{subjectId}, #{uploaderId}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE exam_bank_collection SET user_id = #{userId}, bank_name = #{bankName}, subject_id = #{subjectId}, uploader_id = #{uploaderId}, collected_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM exam_bank_collection WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY collected_time DESC
